text: The men's sprint K-2 (kayak double) 1000 metres competition at the 2018 Asian Games was held from 29 to 30 August 2018. ==Schedule== All times are Western Indonesia Time (UTC+07:00) {|class = "wikitable" style="text-align:center;" ! width=220|Date ! width=50|Time ! width=100|Event |- | rowspan="2"|Wednesday, 29 August 2018 || 10:30 || Heats |- | 17:40 || Semifinal |- | Thursday, 30 August 2018 || 10:10 || bgcolor=ffffcc|Final |} == Results == === Heats === * Qualification: 1–3 → Final (QF), Rest → Semifinal (QS) ==== Heat 1 ==== {| class=wikitable style="text-align:center" !width=40|Rank !width=250|Team !width=80|Time !width=50|Notes |-bgcolor="ccffcc" |1 |align=left| Ilya Golendov Andrey Yerguchyov |3:27.907 || QF |-bgcolor="ccffcc" |2 |align=left| Lucas Teo Brandon Ooi |3:35.287 || QF |-bgcolor="ccffcc" |3 |align=left| Keiji Mizumoto Seiji Komatsu |3:41.327 || QF |-bgcolor="#ffffcc" |4 |align=left| Andri Sugiarto Erik Saf |3:44.905 || QS |-bgcolor="#ffffcc" |5 |align=left| Abdusattor Gafurov Zohirjon Nabiev |3:52.381 || QS |-bgcolor="#ffffcc" |6 |align=left| L.
